img_above_text:
![Five Skandhas \(5\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Five_Skandhas_%285%29.png)
The Skandha of Choice can be found in Chapter 4. Go right from The Purifying Spring Keeper's Choice and up the stairs and through the gap in the wall.
img_below_text:
Hug the wall on the right as you follow the path up to the next set of stairs and a wooden bridge. Cross the wooden bridge, and follow the path as it curves around to the left.
![Five Skandhas \(7\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c6/Five_Skandhas_%287%29.png)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:

            Context:

The Skandha of Choice can be found in Chapter 4. Go right from The Purifying Spring Keeper's Choice and up the stairs and through the gap in the wall."
            - Following Text: "Hug the wall on the right as you follow the path up to the next set of stairs and a wooden bridge. Cross the wooden bridge, and follow the path as it curves around to the left.
![Five Skandhas \(7\).png](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c6/Five_Skandhas_%287%29.png)"

img_summary:
1. **Summary of the Image**:  
The image depicts a dark, rocky path in a cave-like environment with the player character standing in the foreground. Two red arrows highlight a route through the area, directing the player to proceed up a slope and towards a gap in the wall, as part of the journey to locate the Skandha of Choice in *Black Myth: Wukong*.

2. **Purpose/Narrative Role**:  
The image serves as a visual guide to help players navigate the environment in Chapter 4. It illustrates the specific path to follow after leaving The Purifying Spring Keeper's Choice, aligning with the preceding and following text instructions.
